recent.title: Words Never Fall Apart
recent.desc: Words Never Fall Apart (WNFA) is an interactive art project that generates posters from handwritten poems.

recent.title: WNFA Online Poster Generator
recent.desc: A publicly-available online version of the original WNFA project with its backend supported by Azure serverless computing products. The frontend is redesigned to adapt the new requimemnts

recent.title: WNFA 3D Virtual Gallery (3D website)
recent.desc: A 3D Virtual Gallery that displays the poster results generated by WNFA at Zhejiang Exhibition Hall from 06.01.2022 to 06.12.2022. It is written in pure JavaScript. 3D is achieved by CSS 3D transform.

recent.title: Aghnu's ASCII Art Generator
recent.desc: An ASCII Art Generator written in JavaScript, using opencv.js. Code is running on client side. It supports gif and static images convertion. The output is displayed as HTML elements and animated by JavaScript.

recent.title: Aghnu's Console
recent.desc: A personal project that serves as my personal website. It is meant to explore new website design that differs from common patterns

recent.title: GFE.js (open source js module)
recent.desc: GFE is a simplification of the project libgif-js. It provides a function to extract the frames of a gif.

recent.title: Yu Liu's Homepage
recent.desc: Yu Liu's personal website portfolio developed by me. Collabrated with the designer at Wudiao on UI/UX design. Used Azure CDN and DNS to ensure content is accessible in China

recent.title: Xiaohongshu Userscript
recent.desc: A tampermonkey userscript created to collect and export query result from Xiaohongshu Dandelion

past.title: Stranding Air (the frontend website of a creator community) (work in progress)
past.desc: A website for a group of passionate people who are interested in exploring the boundary of visual design, art, media, and technology.

past.title: Interactive Moodle Plugin
past.desc: This plugin is a Moodle Activity Module that is developed for Delphi technology as part of their future online learning platform for aviators.

past.title: A python implementation of Hollow Heap
past.desc: hollow_heap.py is a python implementation of Hollow Heap base on Thomas Dueholm Hansen, Haim Kaplan, Robert E. Tarjan, Uri Zwick 's paper https://arxiv.org/abs/1510.06535.

past.title: MoodSwing
past.desc: MoodSwing is a Java-based android app designed to record and archive userâ€™s mood in relation to geo location and time. Users can follow each other on MoodSwing and view their friend's mood records.

past.title: Yonder
past.desc: Yonder is a distributed social network using RESTful API. (UAlberta CMPUT404 class project)
